charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across
Perrin taking photos in the forest.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_0400:
You’re just too adorable, you know that?!
I could eat you right up!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_0500:
Hm? What’s wrong, Growlithe? Did you find
something?
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_0700: Were you listening to me all this time?
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_0800:
Ahahaha... Once I start snapping photos
and getting into it, I just can’t help it!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_0900:
My partner Pokémon, Growlithe, is irresistibly
cute, if I do say so myself.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1000:
Actually, she has a younger brother who
likes battling.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1100: But compared to him, she’s not as fond of it.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1200:
So I was thinking of doing some training
with her here, for Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1300: But it kind of turned into a photo shoot!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1400: It’s all because she’s so cute!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1500:
Hm? Oh, have you not seen a Growlithe like
this before?
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1600:
This form was seen a lot in Sinnoh back
when it was still called the Hisui region.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_1700:
Compared to the Growlithe we see in this
era, doesn’t the little horn on her head make
her the cutest?
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_0401_2000:
She’s my partner, after all—and my pride
and joy!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_0402_2300: She’s the perfect subject for photos!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_2400:
I want to be the expert on what makes
Growlithe so amazing.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_2500:
Up till now, I thought I could be as long as
she were by my side.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_2600:
But lately, I’ve been hoping we can battle
together here on Pasio, too!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_2700:
On Pasio, your bond with your Pokémon is
what makes you strong.
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_2800:
Once I realized that, I thought maybe we
could use battling to grow even closer!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_2900: You feel the same way, Growlithe?
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_3000:
If you don’t mind, could you help us out and
battle us, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_3100: All right! I figured you’d be on board!
charaepi_ch0338_00_sazare/2301_1201_3300:
We’ll take a new step forward...and take
the ultimate shot!
